basics.name: Kaï (Shay) Bergmann
basics.label: DevOps Engineer | AWS & Cloud Automation
basics.summary: DevOps Engineer with extensive experience in cloud infrastructure automation and CI/CD pipeline management. Proficient in using Terraform for infrastructure as code and working with a variety of CI tools like CircleCI, Travis, and Buildkite. Skilled in cloud resource management, security automation with tools like Vault, and optimizing workflows for efficiency and reliability. Strong foundation in deploying scalable systems and managing cloud environments to support dynamic business needs.

work.name: Flo-Fab Inc (via Collège de Bois-des-Boulogne)
work.summary: Developing the production dashboard for a manufacturing company’s new internal system as part of a cohort of 3 students. Responsible for both backend and frontend development to create a key component used by factory workers to streamline production processes.
highlights: Implemented API endpoints and developed responsive UI components for the production dashboard using ASP.NET Core, React, and MSSQL.
Integrated testing frameworks into the project and implemented unit and integration tests to ensure system reliability.
Created a CI pipeline to improve the build and integration process, enhancing development workflow.
Actively used version control (Git) for collaboration and change management.
Reviewed pull requests to ensure code quality and adherence to project standards.
Followed Agile and Scrum methodologies, participating in regular sprints, standups, and backlog grooming to manage project tasks and progress.
Collaborated with fellow students and Flo-Fab’s developers to build and refine the production dashboard based on project specifications.

work.name: Self-employed (Freelance)
work.summary: Developed and launched a photo rating app on the App Store, initially created as a personal project. Gained further experience through freelance work maintaining a music app, refining skills in app development and deployment.
highlights: Developed and published a mobile app, designing and implementing its UI and core functionality.
Maintained and improved an existing music app, fixing bugs, refining UX, and ensuring stability for active users.
Communicated with stakeholders to prioritize issues and implement solutions effectively.
Optimized performance and improved maintainability in both projects through targeted refactoring and enhancements.

work.name: Input Output Global (formerly IOHK)
highlights: Participated in the development and maintenance of the team's itnernal deployment tools (exposure to Rust, Golang and Crystal).
Made contributions to upstream Nix-ecosystem tools (exposure to C++, Python and Perl).
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement robust infrastructure solutions, ensuring high availability and scalability for critical systems.
Deployed and maintained monitoring and alerting systems to proactively identify and resolve performance issues.
Developed and automated deployment pipelines using various tools and services, including CircleCI, Buildkite, Docker, Nix; and its native CI solution Hydra.
Conducted incident response and root cause analysis to identify underlying system weaknesses, leading to proactive system enhancements.
Collaborated with development teams to improve application performance, reliability, and scalability through code reviews and performance tuning.
Refactored and modularized IaC code bases, thereby increasing readability, maintainability and reusability.
Mentored junior team members, providing guidance on best practices, troubleshooting techniques, and automation strategies.

work.name: Benbria Corporation
highlights: Streamlined build processes to improve efficiency and reduce deployment time, resulting in faster release cycles and increased productivity.
Designed and implemented robust continuous integration (CI) pipelines, ensuring reliable and automated software delivery.
Leveraged infrastructure-as-code (IaC) principles to codify and automate the provisioning and management of cloud infrastructure, enhancing scalability and reducing manual configuration efforts.
Implemented configuration management practices to maintain consistent and secure instance configurations, minimizing downtime and enhancing system stability.
Developed and implemented monitoring and metrics collection systems to gain insights into system performance, enabling proactive identification and resolution of issues.
Actively pursued ongoing professional development to stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies, continuously enhancing skills and knowledge.
Developed a self-serve deployment dashboard for the developers, leveraging NodeJS, WebSockets, Ember.js and the GitHub API.

work.name: Panaya LTD
highlights: Led the successful migration to EC2 cloud infrastructure, ensuring a seamless transition and improved scalability for critical systems.
Automated the deployment and configuration management of production instances, reducing manual toil and enabling faster and more reliable releases.
Developed internal tools and dashboards to enhance operational efficiency and help control cloud resources cost (exposure to Java and Ruby on Rails).
